title: U.S. hits record high with nearly 500,000 COVID-19 cases in a single day
content:
1. U.S. hits record high with nearly 500,000 COVID-19 cases in a single day  CBS News
  2. See Where Virus Cases Are Rising Fastest  The New York Times
  3. U.S. Hits Record Number of New Covid Cases Twice in Same Week  The Wall Street Journal
  4. COVID-19 cases surge to record highs as country enters third year of the pandemic  CBS Mornings
  5. U.S. Breaks Its Single-Day Case Virus Record For Second Day in a Row  The New York Times

localize.title: 米国では1日で約50万人のCOVID-19感染者が発生し、過去最高を記録
美国创下历史新高，一天内有近50万个COVID-19病例
美國創下歷史新高，一天內有近50萬個COVID-19病例
